This story is told by a coffin maker who lets us in on a story of a Constable who was murdered by his wife and her lover. Eventually, the Ghost of the Constable is let loose by some grave robbers, and as you may have guessed it, Mr. Constable ghost is out to make all the lives of the people involved in his death miserable.
